original_text: And the dove came back to him in the evening, and behold, in her mouth was a freshly plucked olive leaf. So Noah knew that the waters had subsided from the earth.
korean_text: 저녁때에 비둘기가 그에게로 돌아왔는데 그 입에 감람나무 새 잎사귀가 있는지라 이에 노아가 땅에 물이 줄어든 줄을 알았으며

sentences.original_text: And the dove came back to him in the evening
in her mouth was a freshly plucked olive leaf.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 부리에는 방금 따낸 감람 잎사귀가 있었다.

sentences.original_text: that the waters had subsided from the earth.
